title: "How can pre-visualization and self-fascination help in achieving life objectives?"
first_phrase: In the final part of this book, we delve into the power of pre-visualization, self-fascination, and self-magnetism. Before we can make use of these techniques, it is crucial that we have developed the qualities and aptitudes discussed in the previous chapters. Just like constructing a building starts with plans and a clear purpose, our journey towards fulfilling our destiny requires us to visualize our objectives. Through presentification and visualization, we can bridge the gap between our will and imagination, and achieve our goals with energy and focus.
content: A building presupposes the prior drafting of plans on the part of an architect who has pondered at length its size, its degree of importance, and the purposes which the building to be erected will have to serve. In spite of that fact, the actual construction of this building is going to materialize but by bit without the architect needing to direct his attention to the whole, inasmuch as it is enough for him to focus on the immediately next phase of the work at any given time. In that manner, we do not have to live under a perpetual spiritual tension about the building having to necessarily resemble a fixed idea. It would suffice us if we were to generally target the purpose behind our activity. This is indeed what we have done so far, and what we are now going to do through the means of self- fascination and self-magnetism, which are forms that might be likened to hypnosis in one sense, and yet are additionally accompanied by a thought shot through with energy. In the course of the preceding chapter, we have spoken about presentification. Visualization might avail us in this context. Constructing images is the key to the meeting between will and imagination.
last_phrase: In conclusion, constructing images through self-fascination and self-magnetism is a powerful technique that can give your life direction and enable you to create the situations you desire. Before you can start this process, it is important to study yourself, your needs, and your character to determine your true objectives. With this approach, you can steer your mind and the universe towards a specific direction and achieve the heights of success that you desire.
